Nightlight::

"I don't know what to say" said Nighlight with fear "How can I be 
sure that you won't kill me when we are away and after that you come 
back and try to kill Aerotaur and Trinity?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> (Birdbot is shot in his shoulder. He quickly moves his right hand, 
avoiding the staff by inches. He laughs at Aerotaur. He wouldn't 
attack though. He first wanted an answer from Nightlight...)
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Rudra656@a...

> 
> 
>   ::Aerotaur:: 
>         He stood very still unsure of how Birdbot would react.  He 
slowly 
>   circled toward the wall so as to get a clean shot at Birdbot.  
Without 
>   lifting his left hand too high he fired a shot at Birdbot.  He 
simultaneously 
>   swung with his bladed staff in his right hand.
